channel.title: MYB
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from MYB, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: You Might Have Perfect Pitch And Not Even Know It, Study Suggests
item.description: Researchers discovered that people not only remember the melody of the songs that get stuck in their head, but can also sing them in the correct pitch...

item.title: The President Of Verizon Global Services Has A Game Plan For Gen AI
item.description: Shankar Arumugavelu has developed an AI and generative AI game plan for Verizon to improve employee and customer experience.

item.title: Brighten up a room

item.title: Some Promising News About The Bear’s Season 4 Release Date
item.description: There is some news about The Bear season 4's release date, which is a lot closer than you might have imagined.

item.title: Write for someone
item.description: It’s so tempting to write for everyone. But everyone isn’t going to read your work, someone is. Can you tell me who? Precisely? What did they believe ...

item.title: Three Predictions For How AI Will Reshape Academia
item.description: Here are three predictions for how AI will reshape academia for tech, faculty and students.

item.title: Are Organizations Ready For The Full Integration Of AI?
item.description: Business and IT leaders are ready and willing to make artificial intelligence a core component of their business operations.

item.title: “How can I help?”
